*** NEW INSTRUCTIONS FOR WINDOWS USERS ***

1. Unrar using Winrar/Winzip

2. Now it's time to block the program from accessing the internet by itself.
- Control Panel
- Windows Firewall
- [on left side] Click Advanced Settings
- [on left side] Click Outbound Rules
- [on right side] Click New Rule
- Tick PROGRAM
- Browse For File Location >
- Tick BLOCK CONNECTION
- Tick ALL 3: DOMAIN, PRIVATE, PUBLIC
- Name It Tunebite.7 [so you know what it is that you are blocking.
- CLOSE ALL FIREWALL WINDOWS. You are done.
- Yes, the program will still work.

3. Use serial below provided to register
[serial removed - download the torrent]

4. Done
